title: What is an update set?
correctAnswers: Group of one or more changes that can be moved from one instance to another all together.
choices: A server-side script that runs when a record is displayed, inserted, updated, or deleted, or when a table is queried.
Group of one or more changes that can be moved from one instance to another all together.
A series of tables and fields that store information about the Configuration Items (CIs) owned by your organization.
One method of security that restricts access to data by requiring users to pass a set of requirements before they can interact with it.

title: What happens to changes on the same object in multiple update sets when update sets are merged?
correctAnswers: The most recent change to the object will be saved in the merged update set
choices: The most recent change to the object will be saved in the merged update set
Multiple versions of the change are stored in multiple update sets
All update sets for that object will be removed automatically from the merged update set

title: Name four benefits that an accurate, up-to-date CMDB presents to an IT Team.
correctAnswers: Locating failed changes and associated incidents.
Facilitate impact analysis of proposed changes to reduce or eliminate downtime.
Assess problem trends pertaining to specific CIs.
Efficiently manage incidents affecting CIs and service delivery.
choices: Risk management becomes increasingly difficult, and service improvement cannot be measured.
Locating failed changes and associated incidents.
Facilitate impact analysis of proposed changes to reduce or eliminate downtime.
Assess problem trends pertaining to specific CIs.
Efficiently manage incidents affecting CIs and service delivery.
